title: Retail: Team Lead - (Visual)
content:
OVERVIEW:As a brand, we shout about our mission to unite the conditioning community. To you and I, this is simply bringing together the Gymshark family ‚Äì those that wear our products, support the brand, follow our Athletes or give us a ‚Äòlike‚Äô on socials ‚Äì basically all the people that have made us the success we are today.We are super excited, because for the first time in Gymshark history, we‚Äôll be taking our purpose offline and setting up shop with a permanent retail space in central London. Our store will behave in a way that‚Äôs totally unique to Gymshark. That‚Äôs why this won‚Äôt be your typical retail role ‚Äì if you think experience first, retail second, then you won‚Äôt be far wrong.
The Team Leads at this store will be vital in helping to maintain the vibe that our family feel online, IRL. As a crucial role in the leadership team of our retail space, you‚Äôll be key in supporting the whole team to help bring Gymshark to life, in real life. You‚Äôll build and connect a hyper-localised and fully engaged community in your market, treating them like family. We don‚Äôt care if they buy, browse, or just hang out. What matters is providing a safe space where everyone belongs and feels welcome.To be successful in this role, you‚Äôll need to have the above mindset, and be an inspirational role model to your team. In your role, you‚Äôll also be responsible for supporting our Go To Market/Visual Merchandising Pillar. 
We are located in Regent Street, Central London with global presence from the Gymshark Community, if you're bi/multilingual we'd love to hear from you (but it's not a prerequisite).
WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING:

A champion for all things ‚ÄòGo to Market.‚Äô Anything customer facing needs to have your seal of approval to ensure it‚Äôs the slickest offering around. 
Leading visual team who inspires both customers and internal team with vision and trend setting. Pushing boundaries with styling and product displays.
Coaching and mentoring the wider team to upskill Visual, always on the lookout for the next VM specialist.
As the ultimate brand & product experience gatekeeper, you set the standard for Gymshark IRL, elevating the brand and product experience for our community to interact with. You are a future focused and visionary. 
Reinvent, inspire, and test the visual experience of merchandising, through flexible retail, digital content, and creative merchandising. Testing and recognising the impact of the movement.
Responsible for strategic visual merchandising execution of the store, while thinking about the ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs next‚Äù and being present to the now. 
Collaborating with GSHQ partners to ensure the Product Life Story is brought to life, IRL. Understanding both the Art and the Science. 
Providing the best sensory experience for those who enter the store. Visually compelling displays and innovative commercial layouts each time a New Product Drops. 

WHAT YOU'LL NEED:

Community building in a new market.
Some digital experience.
Experience in a similar role.  
Experience of working in a fast-paced, high volume, agile environment.
Experience managing teams and are passionate about development. 
Highly effective communicator, written and verbal. 
You are comfortable shifting gears and spinning multiple plates.
Must be able to take and give constructive feedback.

WHO YOU ARE

Aligned to and inspired by our brand values 
A shared passion for our team, customer / community experiences and brand / product education
You do everything to ensure community and customer satisfaction 
You are passionate about development and have a strong belief in individuals‚Äô potential 
Your energy is infectious, you inspire those around you 
You have integrity 
Future focused visionary  
A natural networker and connector 
You do all of this whilst having fun, and ensuring others around you are too  
You can commit to working where and when the retail teams need you. This could be in-store, on weekends or bank holidays

COMPETENCIES: 

Priority Setting ‚Äì Spends time and the time of others on what‚Äôs important; quickly zeros in on the critical few and puts the trivial many aside; can quickly sense what will help or hinder accomplishing a goal; eliminates roadblocks; creates focus.
Informing ‚Äì Provides information people need to know to do their best work and feel good about being a member of the team; provides individuals information so that they can make accurate decisions: Is timely with Information.
Time Management ‚Äì Uses time effectively and efficiently; concentrate his/her efforts on the more important priorities; gets more done in less time than others; can attend to a broader range of activities.
Customer Focused ‚Äì Is dedicated to meeting the expectations and requirements of internal and external customers; gets first-hand customer information and uses it for improvements; acts with customers in mind.
Vision and Purpose ‚Äì Communicates a compelling and inspired vision of sense of core purpose; Talks beyond today; Is optimistic; Creates mileposts and symbols to rally support behind the vision; can inspire and motivate an entire team.
Decision Quality ‚Äì Makes good decisions based upon a mixture of analysis, wisdom, experience, and judgment; Most of his/her solutions and suggestions turn out to be correct and accurate when judged over time; Sought out by others for advice and solutions.

In order to comply with PCI-DSS standards (Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards) which governs how we handle, store and access payment data, this position is subject to satisfactory results from necessary pre-employment checks, including a basic DBS check. This will be conducted at offer stage and covers unspent convictions only. In all cases we‚Äôll always speak to you first and no offers will be automatically withdrawn.
BELONGING AT GYMSHARK.
Our mission is to be a place where everyone belongs. We‚Äôre an equal opportunities employer, and for us that means we always strive to be as inclusive as possible in all aspects of employment, right from your application. We‚Äôre committed to finding reasonable adjustments* for candidates with specific needs or have a disability during our recruitment process, and all applicants will be considered fairly and equally. We do not tolerate discrimination of any kind. *If you‚Äôd like to request a reasonable adjustment please email retailtalent@gymshark.com
ABOUT US.
We‚Äôre here to unite the conditioning community. We believe that putting the sweat in today, prepares us for tomorrow. So, we give people the tools they need to reach further, go faster, be stronger. We celebrate those who show up ‚Äì for themselves ‚Äì to be their physical or mental best, whatever that means for them. It‚Äôs what we want for our community, and our team. A team that‚Äôs growing rapidly around the world. A collective of talented individuals working together to invent Gymshark‚Äôs future. Our plans are ambitious, and we‚Äôre looking for people who want to join us for the ride ‚Äì our growth will be your growth.
THE PERKS.
At Gymshark we believe in the importance of investing in our employees through their physical, mental, and financial health along with being able to provide some fun and inclusive perks along the way.
üèñ 33 days holidays (including Bank Holidays)üí∞ Employer pension contributions up to 7%üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Contribution to a gym membership ü¶à 50% Gymshark Discountü•á Financial, Physical and Mental Wellbeing Supportü§í Paid time off when you‚Äôre physically and mentally unwellüß∏ Very Generous Family Leave package ‚Äì we support you extending your family

demographic_questions.description:
We highly encourage candidates to complete this survey, which will help us understand who is applying to join us. All the information we receive is anonymous and aggregated into an overall report so we can monitor our recruitment processes to make them more inclusive and take positive action to ensure Gymshark is diverse and representative.

For each of the questions, you have the option to select “Prefer not to say” if you don’t want to provide the information.

questions.label: How would you describe your gender identity?
Is your gender identity the same as the sex you were assigned at birth?

answer_options.label: Asian/Asian British - Prefer not to say
Black/African/Caribbean/Black British - Prefer not to say
Mixed/multiple ethnic groups - White & Black Caribbean
Mixed/multiple ethnic groups - White & Black African
Mixed/multiple ethnic groups - Prefer not to say
Other ethnic group - Prefer not to say

questions.label: Do you consider yourself to have a disability or impairment?
Which of the following best describes your sexual orientation?
Tell us: Why Gymshark? Why this job? And why you?
What are your salary expectations (per annum) for this role?
What is your current notice period?
Are you a current Gymshark employee?

questions.description: Legally, we have to verify your Right to Work in the UK before you can start work with us. We're asking for this information now so we know what type of right to work check we need to do later on in the process. Your answer to this question won't affect the outcome of your application, unless you need visa sponsorship and are applying for a role that we can't sponsor.
questions.label: Please confirm your UK Right to Work status.

values.label: I'm a UK or Irish National.
I'm an EU, EEA, or Swiss National with status under the EU Settlement Scheme.
I've got another type of visa, which gives me permanent right to work in the UK.
I've got another type of visa, which gives me temporary right to work in the UK.
I have visa sponsorship from another company, which gives me the right to work in the UK but, would need visa sponsorship to work for Gymshark.
I don't have the right to work in the UK and would need visa sponsorship to work for Gymshark.

questions.description:
‚úÖ Disability Confident Committed 

We’re proud to be a Disability Confident Committed employer and want to encourage anyone with a disability to apply for a role at Gymshark. We offer an interview to candidates with disabilities or long-term conditions who meet the minimum criteria for the role. 

Please let us know below if would you like to apply through the Disability Confident scheme.

values.label: Yes, I want to apply through the Disability Confident scheme

questions.description:
üôå Reasonable Adjustments

We’re committed to finding reasonable adjustments for candidates with specific needs or have a disability during our recruitment process, and all applicants will be considered fairly and equally. We do not tolerate discrimination of any kind. 

If you’d like to request a reasonable adjustment please email talent@gymshark.com.

üîèPrivacy Statement 

We understand that keeping your data safe is really important - it's important to us too!

When you apply for a role with us your personal data in your application will be collected by Gymshark Ltd. and/or Gymshark US Inc. (collectively, “Gymshark”).

This data will be processed subject to our Job Applicant Privacy Notice. 

Please confirm your acknowledgment of this.
